characterabilities.name: Fate Blessed
characterabilities.description: When a friendly Faction model makes an accuracy or damage roll during its activation while in this model’s control range, this model can spend 1 focus point to allow the model to reroll that roll. Each roll can be rerolled once as a result of Fate Blessed.

characterabilities.name: Hell Marked
characterabilities.description: Models destroyed by attacks made by this model never generate soul tokens.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [2]
characterabilities.description: This model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

feat.name: ILLIMITABLE DOMINION
feat.description: While in Horruskh’s control area, friendly  Faction models cannot be knocked down and gain +3 ARM. When a friendly Faction warrior model makes a Tough roll of 4, 5, or 6 while in Horruskh’s control range, that model can remove 1 damage point. Illimitable Dominion lasts for one round.

execution.name: Unyielding
execution.description: This model gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.

ability.name: Blood Boon
ability.description: Once per activation, immediately after resolving an attack in which it destroyed an enemy model with this weapon, this model can cast a spell with COST 3 or less without spending focus.

spells.name: Abattoir
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range can immediately make one basic melee attack. Abattoir can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Thunder Strike
spells.description: Instead of suffering a normal damage roll, a non-incorporeal model hit by Thunder Strike is slammed d6 directly away from the spell's point of origin and suffers a POW 14 damage roll. Collateral damage from this slam is POW 14.

spells.name: Vanish
spells.description: Warp the spellcaster anywhere completely within 3" of its current location. Vanish can be cast only once per activation.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Swift Hunter]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Swift Hunter.

characterabilities.name: Hell Marked
characterabilities.description: Models destroyed by attacks made by this model never generate soul tokens.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [2]
characterabilities.description: This model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

characterabilities.name: Swift Hunter
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a basic ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can advance up to 2".

feat.name: Pandemonium
feat.description: While in Kishtaar’s control range, models in her battlegroup gain Reposition [3"]. Additionally, while in Kishtaar's control range models in her battlegroup gain an additional die on accuracy and damage rolls. Discard the lowest die in each roll. Pandemonium lats for one turn.

execution.name: Apparition
execution.description: During your Control Phase, warp this model anywhere completely within 2" of its current location.

spells.name: Fire Group
spells.description: While models in the spellcaster's battlegroup are in its Control Range, their ranged weapons gain +2 RNG. Fire Group lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Open Fire
spells.description: Target Cohort model in this model's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can immediately make one basic ranged attack. A model can be targeted by open fire only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Soul Taker [5 Tokens]
characterabilities.description: This model can gain soul tokens. This model can carry up to 5 soul tokens at any time.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [2]
characterabilities.description: This model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

feat.name: HOWL OF THE ABYSS
feat.description: Oriax gains up to 5 soul tokens. Additionally, while in Oriax’s control range the melee weapons of Cohort models in his battlegroup gain Shadow Bind. Howl of the Abyss lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Ghost Shield
execution.description: This model gains +1 ARM for each soul token currently on it.

topability.name: Soul Mastery
topability.description: At any time during its activation, this model can spend soul tokens to use one of the following effects for each token spent:

subabilities.name: Gate of Worlds
subabilities.description: Once per turn at any time during its activation, this model can spend one soul token to place a friendly Faction model within 5” of this model anywhere completely within 2” of its current location. A model can be placed as a result of Gate of Worlds only once per turn.

subabilities.name: Soul Phase
subabilities.description: This model can spend a soul token at any time during its activation to become Incorporeal until the start of your next turn.

subabilities.name: Vengeful Spirits
subabilities.description: Choose a warjack in this model's battlegroup that is in it's CMD Range. The Warjack gains up to 3 focus.

spells.name: Curse Of Shadows
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 ARM. A model can advance through an affected model if it has enough movement to move completely past its base.

spells.name: Icy Grip
spells.description: Target warrior model/unit without resistance: Cold suffers -2 DEF and cannot run or make power attacks or special attacks.

spells.name: Onslaught
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction models beginning their activations in its Control Range gain Relentless Charge for one turn. (While advancing as part of a charge, a model with Relentless Charge gains Pathfinder.

spells.name: Star-Crossed
spells.description: While in the spellcaster’s control range, enemy models gain an additional die on accuracy rolls. Discard the highest die of each roll. Star-Crossed lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Overtake]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Overtake. (When a model with Overtake destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, after the attack is resolved it can immediately advance up to 1".)

characterabilities.name: Hell Marked
characterabilities.description: Models destroyed by attacks made by this model never generate soul tokens.

characterabilities.name: Overtake
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, after the attack is resolved it can immediately advance up to 1".

characterabilities.name: Prowl
characterabilities.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [3]
characterabilities.description: This model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

feat.name: INVOCATION OF FIRE
feat.description: This activation, Sabbreth can cast each of her spells once without spending focus.

execution.name: Stealer of Life
execution.description: This model's weapons gain Life Stealer.

ability.name: Witch Mark
ability.description: If this attack hits an enemy model during this model's activation, until the end of that activation this model can target and automatically hit that enemy model with spells, ignoring RNG and LOS.

spells.name: Crippling Grasp
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 SPD, DEF and ARM, STR.

spells.name: Fog Of War
spells.description: Models gain concealment while in the spellcaster's Control Range.

spells.name: Perdition
spells.description: When an enemy model is damaged by Perdition, immediately after the attack is resolved one warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is currently in it's Control Range can make a full advance toward the nearest enemy model. A model can advance as a result of perdition only once.

characterabilities.name: Bulldoze
characterabilities.description: When this model is B2B with an enemy model during it's Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.

characterabilities.name: Gun Platform
characterabilities.description: This model can make ranged attacks even while in melee and can target models outside of melee.

characterabilities.name: Modular [5] [Head, Right Fist, Right Forearm, Left Fist, Left Forearm]
characterabilities.description: This model is a modular design and has 5 groups to choose an option for. During list construction, choose one of the provided options per group. The model's total point cost is equal to the point costs of all selected options. This model gains the keywords, abilities, weapons and statistic adjustments of the selected options.

characterabilities.name: Orgoth Monstrosity
characterabilities.description: This model is a monstrosity that can be included in any Orgoth Warcaster’s battlegroup. An Orgoth warcaster can allocate focus points to this model as if it were a warjack. If this model’s warcaster is destroyed or removed from the table, it becomes autonomous. An Orgoth warcaster can take control of an autonomous friendly Monstrosity. To do this, an Orgoth warcaster must spend 1 focus point during its activation while B2B with the autonomous monstrosity. The monstrosity must forfeit either its normal movement or combat action the turn it becomes controlled. The monstrosity becomes a part of the battlegroup of the warcaster that took control of it. At any time during its activation, an Orgoth warcaster can spend focus points to heal damage a monstrosity in its battlegroup in its control range has suffered. For each focus point spent this way, remove 1 damage point.

ability.name: Arcing Fire
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.

ability.name: Reload [1]
ability.description: This model can spend up to 1 focus, fury, or essensce to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

abilities.name: Pain Maddened
abilities.description: When this model is damaged by an enemy attack, it gains +2 SPD for one round.

abilities.name: Snacking
abilities.description: When this model boxes a living model with a melee attack, it can choose to remove the boxed model from play. When it does, this model can remove d3 damage points.

ability.name: Drag
ability.description: When this attack hits an enemy model with an equal or smaller base, immediately after the attack is resolved the enemy model can be pushed directly toward this model until it contacts a model, an obstacle, or an obstruction. After the enemy model is moved, this model can make one basic melee attack against the enemy model. After resolving this melee attack, this model can make additional melee attacks during it's Combat Action.

ability.name: Shadow Bind
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon suffers Shadow Bind for one round. (A model suffering shadow Bind suffers -3 DEF, and for one round when it advances it cannot move except to change facing. Shadow Bind can be shaken.)

ability.name: Choking Ash
ability.description: On a direct hit, living warrior models hit cannot run or charge for one round unless they can ignore gas effects.

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

ability.name: Critical Grievous Wounds
ability.description: On a critical hit, a model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

ability.name: Choking Ash
ability.description: On a direct hit, living warrior models hit cannot run or charge for one round unless they can ignore gas effects.

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

ability.name: Critical Grievous Wounds
ability.description: On a critical hit, a model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

characterabilities.name: Gung-ho
characterabilities.description: This model can run or charge without spending focus or fury.

characterabilities.name: Modular [3]
characterabilities.description: This model is a modular design and has 3 groups to choose an option for. During list construction, choose one of the provided options per group. The model's total point cost is equal to the point costs of all selected options. This model gains the keywords, abilities, weapons and statistic adjustments of the selected options.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.description: When this model destroys one or more models with a melee attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved it must make one additional melee attack against another model in its melee range.

abilities.name: Bloodthirst
abilities.description: When it charges a living model, this model gains +2” movement.

ability.name: Critical Brutal Damage
ability.description: On a critical hit, gain an additional die on this weapon’s damage rolls against the target directly hit.

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

ability.name: Critical Dispel
ability.description: On a critical hit, upkeep spells an animi on the model/unit hit immediately expire.

ability.name: Reload [1]
ability.description: This model can spend up to 1 focus, fury, or essensce to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

ability.name: Sustained Attack
ability.description: During this model's activation, when it makes an attack with this weapon against the last model hit by the weapon this activation, the attack automatically hits.

characterabilities.name: Hyper-Aggressive
characterabilities.description: When this model suffers damage from an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make a full advance directly toward the attacking model.

characterabilities.name: Poltergeist
characterabilities.description: When an enemy model misses this model with an attack, immediately after the attack is resolved you can choose to push the enemy model d3" directly away from this model.

characterabilities.name: Soul Taker [3 Tokens]
characterabilities.description: This model can gain soul tokens. This model can carry up to 3 soul tokens at any time.

topability.name: Soul Collector [10"]
topability.description: When a living enemy model is destroyed while withing 10" of this model, this model gains the destroyed model's token.  This model can spend soul tokens for the following:

subabilities.name: Dark Blessing
subabilities.description: Once per turn at any time during its activation, you may spend one token from this model’s weapon, if you do, this model gains +3 DEF for one round.

subabilities.name: Soul Generator
subabilities.description: At the start of this model’s activation, you can spend soul tokens on this model to give it 1 focus point for each token spent.

subabilities.name: Spectral Vortex
subabilities.description: This model can immediately negate any spell that targets it or a model within 3" of it by spending 1 soul token. The negated spell does not take effect, but its COST remains spent.

ability.name: Possession
ability.description: When this model hits an enemy non-Leader model with a basic melee attack during this model’s activation, this model can spend a soul token to take control of the enemy model. Immediately after the attack has been resolved, you can make a full advance with the enemy model and can then make one basic attack, then Possession expires. The enemy model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement. A model can be affected by Possession only once per turn.

ability.name: Gates of Hell
ability.description: Once per activation, immediately after resolving an attack in which this model destroyed a living or undead enemy model with this weapon, this model can spend one soul token to be placed anywhere completely within 4” of its current location, then its activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Berserk
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more models with a melee attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved it must make one additional melee attack against another model in its melee range.

The monstrosity must forfeit either its normal movement or combat action the turn it becomes controlled. The monstrosity becomes a part of the battlegroup of the warcaster that took control of it. At any time during its activation, an Orgoth warcaster can spend focus points to heal damage a monstrosity in its battlegroup in its control range has suffered. For each focus point spent this way, remove 1 damage point.

ability.name: Man Catcher
ability.description: A warrior model hit by this attack suffers -2 DEF and cannot advance while within the model's melee range.

abilities.name: Hunter
abilities.description: This model ignores concealment and cover when making ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Relentless Charge
abilities.description: While advancing as part of a charge, this model gains Pathfinder.

ability.name: Drag

After the enemy model is moved, this model can make one basic melee attack against the enemy model. After resolving this melee attack, this model can make additional melee attacks during it's Combat Action.

ability.name: Thresher (★Attack)
ability.description: This model makes one melee attack with this weapon against each model in it's LOS that is in this weapon's melee range. Thresher attacks are simultaneous.

ability.name: Powerful Attack
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can spend 1 focus point to boost all attack accuracy and damage rolls for the attack.

ability.name: Volume Fire
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon gain +1 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against medium-based models and +2 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against large, extra-large, and huge-based models.

ability.name: Critical Shred
ability.description: On a critical hit with this weapon during this model's Combat Action, after the attack is resolved this model can make one additional attack with this weapon against the model hit.

characterabilities.name: Primal Rage
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, when this model suffers damage from an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make a full advance toward the attacking model and can make one basic melee attack.

characterabilities.name: Shield Guard
characterabilities.description: When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have this model directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

characterabilities.name: Spell Ward
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

ability.name: Critical Decapitation
ability.description: On a critical hit, double the damage exceeding the ARM of the model hit. A model disabled by this attack cannot make a Tough roll.

characterabilities.name: Berserk
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more models with a melee attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved it must make one additional melee attack against another model in its melee range.

characterabilities.name: Blade Shield
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 DEF vs ranged attack accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.name: Blood Drinker
characterabilities.description: Immediately after this model resolves a melee attack in which it destroys one or more living models, it can end its activation and remove d3 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Side Step

characterabilities.name: Soul Transfer (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction model with a Soul Taker special rule. If the model is in range, remove any number of soul tokens from this model and place them on the friendly model.

topability.name: Battle Plan
topability.description: This model can use one of the following plans at any time during its activation. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one plan each turn.

subabilities.name: Combat Coordination
subabilities.description: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model. If the target model is in range, during its activation this turn, it can reroll one accuracy or damage roll, then Combat Coordination expires.

subabilities.name: Precision Strike
subabilities.description: While within this models command range friendly models ignore other friendly models when determining LOS. Friendly models can advance through other friendly models within this model's command range if they have enough movement to move completely past them. Precision Strike lasts for one turn.

subabilities.name: Stand Your Ground
subabilities.description: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains Set Defense for one round.

characterabilities.name: Overtake

characterabilities.name: Rage Fueled
characterabilities.description: When this model is damaged by an enemy attack, it gains one rage token. This model can have up to three rage tokens at any time. This model gains +1 to its melee accuracy and melee damage rolls for each rage token on it. This model can spend rage tokens for the following:

topability.name: Rage Fueled
topability.description: When this model is damaged by an enemy attack, it gains one rage token. This model can have up to three rage tokens at any time. This model gains +1 to its melee accuracy and melee damage rolls for each rage token on it. This model can spend rage tokens for the following:

subabilities.name: Brutality
subabilities.description: During its Combat Action, this model can spend rage tokens to make additional melee attacks. It can make one additional attack for each token spent.

subabilities.name: Hyper-Aggression
subabilities.description: When this model suffers damage from an enemy attack, after the attack is resolved, it can spend a rage token to immediately make a full advance directly toward the attacking model.

subabilities.name: Pain Inhibitions
subabilities.description: At any time during its activation, this model can spend rage tokens to remove d3+1 damage for each token spent.

subabilities.name: Rage Howler
subabilities.description: At any time during its activation, this model can spend one rage token to gain Mortal Fear. Rage Howler lasts for one round. (While in this model’s CMD range, living enemy models suffer -2 to damage rolls. Mortal Fear lasts for one round.)

After the enemy model is moved, this model can make one basic melee attack against the enemy model. After resolving this melee attack, this model can make additional melee attacks during it's Combat Action.

characterabilities.name: Battle Wizard

characterabilities.name: Hell Marked
characterabilities.description: Models destroyed by attacks made by this model never generate soul tokens.

characterabilities.name: Veteran Leader [Warwitch Coven]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, Warwitch Coven models gain +1 to attack accuracy rolls.

topability.name: Magic Ability
topability.description: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

subabilities.name: Grim Returns (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG 5 - Target friendly Faction trooper model. If the model is in range, return one destroyed Grunt to its unit. The model returns with 1 unmarked damage box. Place the returned Grunt in formation and completely within 3˝ of the target trooper model. Returned Grunts must forfeit their normal movement or Combat Actions the turn they are returned to play.

subabilities.name: Hex Blast (★Attack)
subabilities.description: This is a RNG 10 AOE 3 13 Arcane Attack. Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.

subabilities.name: Sigil of Power (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, its weapons gain Damage Type: Arcane. Sigil of Power lasts for one turn.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

characterabilities.name: Repair [d6] (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1". Target friendly Faction construct model. If the model is in range, remove d6 damage point from it.

topability.name: Magic Ability
topability.description: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

subabilities.name: Defensive Measure (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG 6. Target friendly Faction Warjack. If the warjack is in range, it gains Shield Guard for one round.

subabilities.name: Exorcism (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG 1. Target friendly Faction warjack, if the warjack is in range, enemy upkeep spells and animi on that warjack immediately expire. Additionally, he warjack gains Spell Ward for one round.

subabilities.name: Tune Up (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG B2B. Target friendly Faction warjack. If the warjack is in range, all attack accuracy and damage rolls resulting from its next basic attack this turn are boosted.

ability.name: Armor-Piercing
ability.description: When calculating damage from this weapon, halve the base ARM stats of the models hit.

characterabilities.name: Prey
characterabilities.description: After deployment but before the first player's turn, choose an enemy model/unit to be this model/unit's prey. This model gains +2 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against it's prey. When the prey is destroyed or removed from play, choose another model/unit to be the prey.

characterabilities.name: Gang
characterabilities.description: When making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in the melee range of another model in this model's battlegroup, this model gains +2 to melee attack accuracy and melee damage rolls.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Sitting Vulture
characterabilities.description: While within 1” with this model, enemy models suffer -1 DEF.

ability.name: Critical Pitch
ability.description: On a critical hit against a model with an equal or smaller base, the model hit can be thrown d6" directly away from this model. The model thrown does not deviate. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the POW of this weapon.

characterabilities.name: Order: Shield Wall
characterabilities.description: Until the start of their next activation, each affected model’s shield grants an additional +2 ARM while B2B with another affected model in its unit. When receiving this order a model can forfeit its Combat Action to gain +3” movement as part of its Normal Movement this turn. This bonus does not apply to damage originating in the model's back arc. Models in this unit can begin the game affected by Shield Wall.

characterabilities.name: Snacking
characterabilities.description: When this model boxes a living model with a melee attack, it can choose to remove the boxed model from play. When it does, this model can remove d3 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Unyielding
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.

ability.name: Combo Strike (★Attack)
ability.description: Make a melee attack. Instead of making a normal damage roll, the POW of the damage roll is equal to this model's STR plus twice the POW of this weapon.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

topability.name: Magic Ability
topability.description: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

subabilities.name: Deathly Power
subabilities.description: This model gains Dark Shroud for one turn.

subabilities.name: Empower (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Faction warjack. If the target warjack is in the range and it was suffering Disruption, it is no longer disrupted. The warjack also gains 1 focus point.

subabilities.name: Flesh Eater (★Attack)
subabilities.description: Flesh Eater is a RNG 8, POW 10 arcane attack. When Flesh Eater destroys an enemy warrior model, you can remove d3 damage points from a friendly living model within 6" of this model.

characterabilities.name: Command Attachment [Reaver]
characterabilities.description: This attachment can be added to a Reaver unit.

characterabilities.name: Cursed
characterabilities.description: While within 5” of this model, enemy models suffer -1 ARM.

characterabilities.name: Granted [Inspiration]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Inspiration. (A model with Inspiration gains +1 to attack accuracy rolls.)

characterabilities.name: Granted [Rise]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Rise. (If a model with Rise is knocked down at the beginning of your Maintenance Phase, it stands up.)

characterabilities.name: Take Up
characterabilities.description: If this model is destroyed, you can choose a trooper in this unit within 1” of it to be destroyed instead. Remove that trooper from the table instead of this model. This model has the same number of unmarked damage boxes as the chosen trooper.
